mapper.sql: id, order_id, user_id, shop_id, box_cost, send_cost, total_money, discount_money, coupon_id, coupon_money, pay_money, pay_way, demand_time, create_time, status
mapper.select: select a.*, b.* from orders a, orders_detail b where a.order_id = b.order_id
mapper.insert: insert into orders (id, order_id, user_id, shop_id, box_cost, send_cost, total_money, discount_money, coupon_id, coupon_money, pay_money, pay_way, demand_time, create_time, status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boxCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payWay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{demandTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} )

id,
order_id,
user_id,
shop_id,

send_cost,

coupon_id,

mapper.update:
update orders
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
box_cost = #{boxCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
send_cost = #{sendCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discount_money = #{discountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_money = #{couponMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
demand_time = #{demandTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, box_cost = #{boxCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, send_cost = #{sendCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount_money = #{discountMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_money = #{couponMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, demand_time = #{demandTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
